page_content: The page discusses the annual siren tests in Switzerland for 2023.
The page discusses the approval of an updated project for the expansion of the Kantonsspital.
The page discusses the release of a new language teaching material in Rumantsch Grischun for the 7th grade.
The page discusses wastewater treatment on highways and cantonal roads.
The page discusses a campaign to distribute red caps to first graders for road safety.
The page discusses a campaign for road safety during the school year, focusing on red caps for first graders.
The page discusses a fishing app for recording fishing statistics and activities.
